Class InnKeeper

  • public class InnKeeper
extends NPC
    Represents the innkeeper NPC used for assessing the shop. Extends NPC

      • InnKeeper

        public InnKeeper(float x,
                 float y,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                 Game game,
                 Citys cities,
                 Player player,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Constructs the InnKeeper.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the innkeeper in pixels.
        y - the y position of the innkeeper in pixels.
        name - the name of the innkeeper.
        image - the image of the innkeeper.
        game - the object that contains all the objects and variables in the game.
        cities - the object containing the array of city objects.
        player - the object containg all of the player objects and methods.
        width - the with in pixels of the innkeeper.
        height - the height of the innkeeper.
